# UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.FooterMode.supplementary

**Case**

A footer mode that uses supplementary views to show footers.

## Declaration

```swift
case supplementary
```

## Discussion

Choose this footer mode to use supplementary views with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionView/elementKindSectionFooter] as the section footer.

By default, lists that use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/Appearance-swift.enum/plain] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/Appearance-swift.enum/sidebarPlain] list appearances use pinned footers. You must use this footer mode if you want to opt into this default pinning behavior.

## Footer modes

- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.FooterMode.none**: No footers are shown.
title: UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.FooterMode.supplementary
